sql: SELECT MIN(n.name) AS of_person, MIN(t.title) AS biography_movie FROM aka_name AS an, cast_info AS ci, info_type AS it, link_type AS lt, movie_link AS ml, name AS n, person_info AS pi, title AS t WHERE an.name LIKE '%a%' AND it.info ='mini biography' AND lt.link ='features' AND n.name_pcode_cf BETWEEN 'A' AND 'F' AND (n.gender = 'm' OR (n.gender = 'f' AND n.name LIKE 'B%')) AND pi.note ='Volker Boehm' AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1980 AND 1995 AND n.id = an.person_id AND n.id = pi.person_id AND ci.person_id = n.id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND ml.linked_movie_id = t.id AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id AND it.id = pi.info_type_id AND pi.person_id = an.person_id AND pi.person_id = ci.person_id AND an.person_id = ci.person_id AND ci.movie_id = ml.linked_movie_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(lt ml t an ci n it pi)
 MergeJoin(it pi)
 HashJoin(lt ml t an ci n)
 HashJoin(an ci n)
 HashJoin(ci n)
 MergeJoin(lt ml t)
 HashJoin(lt ml)
 IndexScan(lt)
 BitmapScan(ml)
 IndexScan(t)
 BitmapScan(an)
 BitmapScan(ci)
 BitmapScan(n)
 TidScan(it)
 IndexScan(pi)
 Leading(((((lt ml) t) (an (ci n))) (it pi))) */
